sentences.en: As he hated army life, he decide to desert his regiment.
sentences.cn: 因为他嫌恶军队生活, 所以他决心背弃自己所在的那个团.

sentences.en: He became a trooper in the Royal Tank Regiment.
sentences.cn: 他当上了皇家坦克团的装甲兵.
他开小差逃离他所在的团.

sentences.en: He made his way back to the farmyard where his regiment was encamped.
sentences.cn: 他设法回到了自己的团驻扎的农家场院。

sentences.en: He was a dishonor to his regiment.
sentences.cn: 他是他所属的团的耻辱.

sentences.en: He was actually gazetted to a captaincy in a marching regiment!
sentences.cn: 官方公报宣布任命他为作战团队的一名上尉!

sentences.en: I would form this crack regiment out of officers alone not a single private .
sentences.cn: 这个顶呱呱的一团，我要完全用军官来组织一个兵也不要。

sentences.en: Our regiment sprang a surprise attack on the enemy position.
sentences.cn: 我团对敌人的阵地发动了一次突击.

sentences.en: That autumn he was placed in command of a regiment.
sentences.cn: 那年秋天他被任命为团长.

sentences.en: The 5 th Regiment bore down on the enemy positions.
sentences.cn: 第五团向敌人阵地压过去.

sentences.en: The Parachute Regiment could be forced to admit women.
sentences.cn: 伞兵团可能会被迫招收女性。

sentences.en: The regiment covered itself with glory in the invasion battle.
sentences.cn: 该团在反侵略的战斗中赫赫有名.

sentences.en: The regiment is on the march.
The regiment secured its position while awaiting the enemy attack.
sentences.cn: 该团在等待敌人进攻之时,加强了防御工事.

sentences.en: the regimented routine of boarding school
sentences.cn: 寄宿学校严格的生活规律

sentences.en: The townspeople received billets ordering them to lodge the regiment overnight.
sentences.cn: 镇民接到命令,要为一团官兵提供一夜住宿.

sentences.en: We were part of an entire regiment that had nothing else to do but to keep that highway open.
sentences.cn: 整个团除了保持那条公路畅通就无事可干，而我们就是这个团的一部分。
